SCREENSIZE_DOC: Folder for METER. Custom folder are in /data/INTERNAL/PeppyMeterBasic/Templates/ and must be named weightxheight-description. ex 800x480-collection.
CHOOSE_METER_DOC: Select the METER in the list
NBARCHANGE: Number of bars in METER changed! Now set to
METER_FOLDER_NAME: Can't determine screen size because the folder is not properly named!,Must be widthxheight-description ex : 800x600-metal. No 'x' allowed in description! please check!
